messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] practising unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: Oh, Dede, I should ve said earlier... I quoted you here: http://sandradodd.com/unschool/gettingit because this was beautifully put: I finally let go of my
messages.messageBody:
Oh, Dede, I should've said earlier...
I quoted you here:

http://sandradodd.com/unschool/gettingit

because this was beautifully put:

"I finally let go of my control issue around TV and video. In its
place I found trust which
created a deepening of love and respect in my relationship with my
son and my family and
everything else in my life. It is amazing how far reaching the effect
was. Just wanted to share
this."

Sandra

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: practising unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: I finally let go of my control issue around TV and video.  In its place I found trust which created a deepening of love and respect in my relationship with my
messages.messageBody:
I finally let go of my control issue around TV and video. In its place I found trust which
created a deepening of love and respect in my relationship with my son and my family and
everything else in my life. It is amazing how far reaching the effect was. Just wanted to share
this. Dede
